…Secretary of the Treasury to  develop a special licensing pilot program within the Office of  Terrorism and Financial Intelligence, and it will be administered by  the Office of Foreign Assets Control.

This pilot project would grant private-sector firms a temporary  specific license to conduct nominal financial transactions with  sanctioned entities…
